introductory_text: Find movies and shows to watch on your favourite OTT channels
how_to_proceed_text: To proceed, we need you to rate a few blockbusters. It won't take more than 30 seconds
terms_consent_text: By sign up you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy. and Terms & Conditions
select_language_helper_text: You can modify selection anytime later...
coachmark_text: Swipe right or tap heart if you like the movie/show. Swipe left or tap X if you don’t like it. Swipe up or tap next to skip
offline_error_message: Network error encountered. Please check your internet connection and try again.
